text: Çırak, is a film by Tayfun Belet made in 2014. The international name is "The Apprentice". ==Synopsis== The film depicts the last parchment master in Turkey, which happens to be a woman despite it being viewed as a job for men. The circumstances and events that lead to this situation are shown in the documentary. The last parchment master happens to be in Bergama, where parchment was first created, and the documentary touches on the history of parchment itself. ==Awards== * 6.
